Frequently Asked Questions.question: My child doesn't have access to the technology needed for online classes during COVID, and I currently don't have the resources to provide one. What are my options?
Frequently Asked Questions.answer: There are several organizations that aim to bridge the digital divide. Visit the COVID19 Resources tab for a list of organizations that help provide the technology students need.

Frequently Asked Questions.question: As a college student, it's really hard for me to pay for school, especially with the pandemic. Are there any scholarships or additional financial aid resources besides what the school can offer?
Frequently Asked Questions.answer: If you visit the College Scholarships tab, you can sort by your major and find a list of scholarships. Best of luck!
